rukus.text: 26|106|geudeul-ui hyeongje noaga geudeul-ege malhaessdeola hananim-eul dulyeowohaji anhneunyo
26|107|sillo naega neohuileul wihan mid eum-ui seonjijala
26|109|naneun neohuiege geue daehan bosang-eul yoguhaji anihamae sillo naui bosang-eun man-yuui junimkkeseo ju sinila
26|111|geudeul-i daedabhagil gajang mi cheonhan jadeul-i ttaleugo issneun neoleul mid eulan mal-inyo
26|112|geuga malhagil geudeul-i haengha go issneun geos-i mueos-inji aneunba eobs doda
26|113|geudeul-ui gyesan-eun danji junimkkeiss-eum-eul neohuineun algo iss-eulila
26|116|ittae geudeul-i malhagil noayeonega man-il dannyeomhaji anhneundamyeon neo neun dol-e maj-a jugge doelila
26|117|geuga malhagil juyeo jeoui baeg seongdeul-i jeoleul geoyeoghanaida
26|118|jeowa geudeul saileul pangyeolhayeojusigo jeowa deobul-eo midneun jadeul-eul guhayeo jusoseo
26|119|hananim-eun geuwa hamkke jim-eul gadeugsil-eun baee tan jadeul-eul guhayeoss nola
26|120|geuleon hu hananim-eun dwie nam eun jadeul-eul igsake haess-euni
26|121|sillo geu an-eneun yejeung-i iss eoss-euna geudeul daedasuneun midji ani hayeossdeola
